dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 231 IH: Canyon Village Land Conveyance Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Young of Alaska introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To fulfill the land conveyance requirements under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act for the Alaska Native Village of Canyon Village, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Canyon Village Land Conveyance Act.
Section 14(h) of the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act (43 U.S.C. 1613(h)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in the matter preceding paragraph (1), by striking and follows and inserting as follows;
by striking the semicolon at the end of each of paragraphs (2) through (5) and inserting a period;
in paragraph (6), by striking this Act; and inserting this Act.;
in paragraph (7), by striking and (5); and and inserting (5), and (12).;
in paragraph (9), in the first sentence, by striking or (5) and inserting (5), or (12);
in paragraph (11), by striking and (6) and inserting (6), and (12); and
by adding at the end the following:

clause.text: The Secretary shall convey to Kian Tr’ee Corporation, for the Native Village of Canyon Village, the surface estate in the land selected by the Kian Tr’ee Corporation under paragraph (2).
For purposes of the conveyance under clause (i), sections 2650.2 and 2653.2(c) of title 43 of the Code of Federal Regulations (or successor regulations) shall not apply.

subparagraph.text: A conveyance under subparagraph (A) shall not exceed 6,400 acres.

clause.text: Unless Doyon Limited elects to make a selection under clause (ii), the Secretary shall convey to Doyon Limited the subsurface estate to the land conveyed under subparagraph (A).
At the option of Doyon Limited, instead of accepting the conveyance under clause (i)—

subclause.text: Doyon Limited may make a selection from existing selections on land withdrawn pursuant to section 11(a)(3) that is equal in acreage to the subsurface estate that would otherwise be conveyed under clause (i); and
the Secretary shall convey to Doyon Limited the subsurface estate selected under subclause (I).
